Text:
I couldn't get the English subtitles loaded right, but I found a working English subtitle file here:

http://www.allsubs.org/subs-download2/lovers-concerto/2770496/

This is good video quality, Thanks for the upload!

Me and my Korean friend spent a good hour learning how to create and edit subtitle files so that the single subtitle file is now 3 separate files, which are perfectly synced to each of these movie parts.

Complete Edited English Subs Here:
http://fileape.com/dl/i9IQ0684TK30LAyk

You're Welcome.
